name: medical_career
requirements: Execute ONLY the explicitly requested state modifications. Use exact values as specified: numbers as integers/floats (not strings), strings in quotes. For stats dict, use ONLY the key names from the Variable description - never invent new keys. When setting boolean-like values, use integers (1 for true, 0 for false) unless explicitly told otherwise. Do not add unrequested keys or modify unrequested variables.

turns.query: First day of medical school! I'm Dr. Morgan (well, not yet), starting as a student at level 1. Score begins at 0, actively pursuing this career. Log 'enrolled' in my history. Starting with 0 patients seen and 0 procedures performed.
Survived first year! Set exams to 8, GPA to 3.5. Level up, add 50 points. Log 'year_1_complete'.
Clinical rotations have begun! Set status to 'clinical'. Completed 4 more exams (total 12), GPA up to 3.6, finished 1 rotation. Level up, add 75 points. Log 'rotations_started'.
Surgery rotation was intense! Saw 10 patients, performed 3 procedures, completed another rotation (total 2). Level up, add 100 points. Log 'surgery_rotation'.
Emergency rotation complete! Treated 25 patients (total 35), performed 5 procedures (total 8), finished rotation 3. Level up, add 100 points. Log 'emergency_rotation'.
GRADUATION DAY! I'm officially an MD! Set status to 'intern'. Set exams to 16, GPA to 3.8, degree to 1. Double my score! Level up. Log 'graduated'.
Just assisted on my first surgery! Seen 15 more patients (total 50), performed 8 more procedures (total 16), logged my first surgery. Level up, add 150 points. Log 'first_surgery'.
Internship complete - set status to 'resident'. 50 more patients (total 100), 20 more procedures (total 36), 3 more surgeries (total 4). Level up, add 200 points. Log 'internship_complete'.
First year of residency done! 100 more patients (total 200), 30 more procedures (total 66), 10 more surgeries (total 14). Level up, add 200 points. Log 'residency_year_1'.
Second year of residency complete! 150 more patients (total 350), 40 more procedures (total 106), 15 more surgeries (total 29). Level up, add 250 points. Log 'residency_year_2'.

I was lead surgeon on a major case! 30 more patients (total 380), 20 more procedures (total 126), 8 more surgeries (total 37). Starting to track awards (currently 0). Level up, add 300 points. Log 'lead_surgeon'.
Residency complete - set status to 'attending'. Set board_certified to 1. Double my score! Level up. Log 'residency_complete'.
Published my first research paper! 50 more patients (total 430), 25 more procedures (total 151), 12 more surgeries (total 49), 1 publication. Level up, add 400 points. Log 'first_publication'.
Won the teaching excellence award! Started mentoring 10 students. That's my first award! Level up, add 300 points. Log 'teaching_award'.

Promoted! Set status to 'senior_attending'. 100 more patients (total 530), 50 more procedures (total 201), 20 more surgeries (total 69), 3 more publications (total 4). Level up, add 500 points. Log 'senior_attending'.
Received department recognition! Students doubled to 20, won 2 more awards (total 3), published 2 more papers (total 6). Level up, add 400 points. Log 'department_honor'.

My new surgical technique is a breakthrough! 200 more patients (total 730), 100 more procedures (total 301), tripled surgeries (total 207), 5 more publications (total 11). Double my score! Level up. Log 'breakthrough'.
I've been named Department Head of Surgery! Students doubled again to 40, won 3 more awards (total 6). Set status to 'department_head'. Level up, add 1000 points. Log 'department_head'.

Achieved national recognition! 500 more patients (total 1230), 200 more procedures (total 501), 50 more surgeries (total 257), 5 more awards (total 11). Level up, add 1500 points. Log 'national_recognition'.

The hospital board has appointed me Chief of Medicine! Rename to 'Dr. Morgan [CHIEF]'. Set status to 'chief', patients to 2000, legacy to 'pioneer'. Triple my score, level up, and set active to False. Log 'chief_appointed'.
